dict.string: FOR EACH: Repeat Process for Each Folder Selected in Finder

Folder (& All Sub-Folders) To be Zipped, and then Moved to TRASH: %Variable%ZIP__Folder%
This Folder will be MOVED TO TRASH, only if the Zip is successful, and its integrity was verified.
If the Zip File already exists, it will be OVERWRITTEN. .
SCRIPT: Execute zip command with Integrity Check (SS Bash)
SET Clipboard to Script Error Report

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ >>> ERROR <<< %ICUDateTime%yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm a%
Zip of Folder FAILED: Folder: %Variable%ZIP__Folder% ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The zip file either was not created, or lacks integrity. The SOURCE Folder was NOT moved to Trash.
This Report from the Zip Command Has Been Placed on the Clipboard ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
%Variable%ZIP__ScriptResults%
SET Clipboard to Report of Results

dict.string: SCRIPT: DELETE All Variables with KMVarPrefix and in KMVars_To_Delete

tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
--- DELETE ALL KM VARIABLES WITH THIS PREFIX ---
set prefixStr to getvariable "KMVarPrefix"
if (prefixStr ≠ "") then set value of variables whose name starts with prefixStr to "%Delete%" --display notification "All KM Variables with PREFIX = '" & prefixStr & ¬ -- "' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script" end if
--- DELETE KM VARS IN THE VARIABLE "KMVars_To_Delete" ---
set varsToDeleteList to paragraphs of (getvariable "KMVars_To_Delete")
if (varsToDeleteList ≠ {}) then
set varsToDeleteList to varsToDeleteList & {"KMVars_To_Delete"}
repeat with oVar in varsToDeleteList setvariable (oVar as text) to "%Delete%" end repeat
--display notification "All KM Variables in 'KMVars_To_Delete' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script"
end if
end tell
@ZIP T -- Zip Folder (& all Sub-Folders) & Move to TRASH
